roleset.name: to catch or try to catch fish, catching fish on a line
roleset.note: FISH-V NOTES: Member of VNcls berry-13.7, hunt-35.1. (from fish.01-v)
FISHING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls berry-13.7, hunt-35.1 (from fishing.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [*] Using direct mail for a TV show is like [*]fishing for whale with a breaded hook .

example.name: metaphorical fish
example.text: I could tell that she was fishing for a compliment.

example.name: both args
example.text: he Chicago Trout Bum - a nice blog keeping you up to date on his trout fishing in Wisconsin and Upper Midwest.
